name: collections::btree::node::Handle::<collections::btree::node::NodeRef<collections::btree::node::marker::Mut<'a>, K, V, NodeType>, HandleType>::dormant

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<coll.doc:
Returns a dormant copy of this node with its lifetime erased which can
 be reawakened later.

doc:
Returns a dormant copy of this handle which can be reawakened later.

 See `DormantMutRef` for more details.
